title: Artificial Intelligence Practice Competency Enhancement: Ecological Dynamics Approach for Elite Sports Training Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational sports science theories, exercise biomechanics, and training methodologies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design VR-based training scenarios by applying ecological dynamics theory (Performer-Environment system).
Learners can develop representative learning design (RLD) training modules by analyzing real sports data (athlete biomechanics, environmental variables).
Learners can suggest improvement plans to enhance the effectiveness of training environments (task appropriateness, environmental interaction) by at least 80% through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
